content.detailedDescription: Went out on my patio, looked up and saw a very bright red light above my head in the sky. a bit bigger than saturne. appeared to be somewhat far, stationary. was not moving at all for a good minute. the edge what rather white/yellow. so, i observed until it disappeared... and it was like it was moving away in space at a very high speed, until it fainted away. no clouds cover that evening, blue sky, stars all over, but that thing was new in the sky, very bright, not a reflection of the sun on an object as it was not moving at all. i canâ€™t imagine that i am the only one who saw it, it was too bright not to be seen!P.S: it was spotted nne of my location at about 75% angle. to be frank, for the few first seconds, i though it was an airplane... but the brightness was too intense to be that. it was just hovering, no sound, no movement, and it got even brighter for a second or two. the edge was sort of white/yellow, oscillating. i though also for a moment that is was the reflection of the sun from a satellite, as the sun was going down at the same time. but it was so bright, fixed in the sky, for a good minute, then flew away until it disappeared. i took a picture with my cell phone, but can't see anything on the picture, probably too small for my phone.
content.summary: Sunday evening at 21:38... bright red light stationnary.

content.detailedDescription:
This morning, at 9:45am on thursday, may 14, 2015, i was driving on i270 from hyattstown, md toward germantown, md, when i saw at about 20 degrees above my horizon, and ahead of me in the sky, 3 objects.

they were flying in a straight line, left to right across my direction of travel, and consisted of two silver cylindrical objects that i would guess were about the size of railroad tank cars but taller and maybe longer, and were ahead of a third object that was black, and square or rectangular in shape, and as large as the cylinders.

i saw no windows on any of the objects, nor any means of propulsion - no wings or propellers - and no discernible tail features.  there was no sign of any smoke or other exhaust features.  i was in heavy morning rush hour traffic, in the center lane, and could not pull over to either side to stop for a better view.

they were moving relatively slowly, and stayed in view for about 40 seconds before i drove past the point where they were off my right side and out of my sight.  if they stayed on that course, they would have passed over the germantown area.

i don't know for sure what they were, and, unless we have technology that i am not aware of, i seriously doubt that they were made by man - homo sapiens.

all of my life, i have believed that we are not alone.  now, unless this can be explained away, i am very sure we are not alone!
content.summary: 2 silver smooth cylindrical objects and 1 box-like with protrusions

content.detailedDescription: My wife and granddaughter and me went to an annual community day carnival ending w/fireworks. fireworks started at 9:36 pm as wife noted that they were close to scheduled time. we watched for 5-10 minutes when my wife pointed to me a light(red) stationary above and to the left of the fireworks( appr. 45 degrees to our right) at 45-50 degree elevation. my first thought was it was a radio or aircraft tower. then realizing where i was and that there are now towers of any kind within seeing distance i said it was a ufo as i normally do. my wife, a nonbeliver, continued to watch this thing instead of the fireworks. it was a steady red light w/ blinking green lights front and rear. like it was watching the fireworks as well. then it started to move away from the fair grounds, straight away from us, made an abrupt 90 degree turn and sped off(faster than any aircraft ive observed) into the surrounding horizon( eastward) my wife was the one who first noticed it and thought it was maybe a chinese lantern hovering.    you asked me at checkout if time was exact or appx. i opted the appx but the time est. is within 5 minutes of accual tim of day
content.summary: Stationary red light w/ green light front and rear. sat motionless for 5+ min then northwarn departure turning eastward abruptly and accelerated beyond capacity of known aircraft capabilities

content.detailedDescription: My friend deb and i were driving back to pennsylvania after having visited my mother in canada. we were heading south about 1:30 am when we saw a flashing light through the trees. when we got closer and there were no trees between us and it we could see that it was a triangle and the whole bottom of it was flashing in intensity, but it would never go dark, it would just get intensely bright and then less bright. i wanted to stop and take a picture or a movie, but my friend was afraid. she said she didn't want to be abducted she had to go to work in the morning. it was just over the trees to the right when we passed it. when we did it started to move off to the north slowly. i could see its flashing in the rear while i drove and my friend watched it for quite a while as we moved away.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Traveling south on 38 toward kingston we saw a flashing light ahead.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing beside my car when i saw a fireball type ufo that landed beside the road.And i could see a insect like alien.I started to come at me the electricity was disturbed but then the entity dissapeared and the ufo started to hover above the ground.Then it dissappeared
content.summary: Shocked

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv and saw a red light thru my window. it lit the window up
i watched it go over top of house. i went into my garden it came over again. went off to the left 
i turned around and saw a second one follow the first and disappeared into distance
it was upside down v shape with a circle of red lights on it
several neighbours came out and also saw it
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: As below

content.detailedDescription:
Attached is a video that i recorded of the 2015 macy's fireworks. if you were to actually watch the original foorage it would be a lot more clearer to see. 

about 16 to 17 seconds into this video i have attached you will see a light moving quickly through the sky and chanhe direction abruptly. it has lights that are not pulsating, blinking, fading etc. it does not have a trail. 

if you look at scaling this object it is moving quickly, changes direction and covering a lot of land very fast. 

when i first noticed it the object moved very quickly across the sky from ledt to right in a stright line. it was odd to me because it didn't resemble any fireworks especially since it was moving in a straight line and abruptly changed direction and continued on. it wasn't fading out or flickering and it wasn't blinking like any plane or fly object should be doing. given the fact that there was a no fly zone in that area during the fireworks i have come to the conclusion that it appears to be a ufo.
content.summary: 2015 macy's fireworks ufo spotted

content.detailedDescription:
I am writing on the behalf of my parents, father and mother, who were on a recent cruise trip across southern europe and caught unidentified flying objects in salerno, italy on their smartphones. they were at the bay, cruise docking area, taking pictures of the mountains and a long bridge across it. my father has taken 7 pictures with samsung galaxy s4, from which on 5 of them, these ufos in saucer shape with glowing lights on the bottom side can be observed clearly. my mother also took several pictures of the same surrounding and direction using iphone s4, the ufos are also seen on these photos, but with lesser clarity. my parents are the owners of the photos. we do not wish to reveal these pictures via report form at this moment, but the information i can give are:
- the approx. location coordinates - 40.675109, 14.746764
- date & time of sighting â€“ 3rd july 2015, 8.35 a.M.
- the image attached (from google earth 3d) shows approx. the scene of my parentsâ€™ photos (mountain and long bridge), on which the ufos were seen on the sky area, above the mountains.
- a sketch of one of the ufo when zoomed in.
- on one of the picture, two ufos are seen.

apart from my parents, another friend of them also captured the ufos on their mobile devices, however also with lesser clarity.

at this moment, these photos havenâ€™t been published anywhere. if you are interested in the photos and the information surrounding the sighting experience, we are willing to work with you. we are willing to show the photos to you in person and in private, if there is a serious interest. we are contacting couple of news agencies at the moment, but the ownership of photos wonâ€™t be hand over until a formal contract is established.

i was not present at the sighting, however, you can take me as a point of contact to my parents for now. if you are interested, contact me back and we can take it further.
content.summary: Ufos daytime sighting in salerno, italy, july 2015. including several photos, across multiple devices.

content.detailedDescription:
Spouse and i were traveling e on i-10 on dec. 19, 2015.  at about 16:00 i noticed an object in the distance. i initially thought it was an aircraft.  i was not driving so i continued watching and noticed it did not appear to be moving.  most planes appear to move over time as one is driving. 

after about 20 min. i asked my spouse to look at the object.  we were past deming, nm, still headed e. i started looking at the object through binoculars, but it was hard to get a fix on it because of the auto movement.  we pulled to the roadside at about 16:30.

i got a fix on the object and we noted the lat. long. to be approximately 32.20948Â°n / 108.08518Â°w, near victorio mountains which has an above ground level of approximately 815 feet. the object was much higher that the mountain top, and guessed to be 5000'+ above the mountain top.

the object was visible through the binoculars and it pretty much filled the field of view.  it was white. i would compare it with zinc.  it was dumbbell shaped, with one end larger than the other, or perhaps you could say it was peanut shaped with one end larger that the other with a gentle inward curvature at the middle.  it also had an armature or long piece coming off of the main body.  this was curved upward. the object had rotated slightly and appeared to again be stationary.

there were no markings.  there was no visible line to tether it in place.  it did not bounce nor move in the wind.  i have seen commercial blimps in the phoenix skies numerous times, and this was much larger than a blimp, and was more stable than a blimp trying to be stationary.

my spouse has a physics background and has worked with nasa. the object baffled him.  he saw what i saw and wondered why other planes were not near because the holloman afb and space port were not very far away.  

we observed the object for about 20 minutes and it merely hung in the air.  my spouse called it station keeping.  it did not demonstrate the nature of a balloon, of a helicopter, or of a blimp.  it remained at the same location demonstrating little or no movement.  

if we were to take a picture, it would have only appeared to have been a white dot in the sky.  we decided to press on to las cruces.  we drove on and a mile or two we reached the turn off for gage, nm.  

i kept looking at the object, and eventually had to look over my shoulder.  now it was approximately 16:55 and the sun was going down.  i checked and the object did not have any lights on it.  we assumed if it was an aircraft or a weather balloon, it would have a light. as the sky got darker and darker, i could still see the object and by 17:15, i was too far away to see it any more. 

we still are perplexed as to what it was.
content.summary: Observed from car, then we stopped.  i was stationary and dumbell shaped.  easy to see through binoculars.

content.detailedDescription: It was in the middle of town and very cloudy when i saw a girl in the hastings parking lot looking at the sky with binoculars and i saw it easily, i pulled out my iphone and took pictures and a short video, it was better seen with the naked eye, it finally faded into the clouds although it didn't appear to move, several people outside the university center were looking at it too, i checked the local paper and no mention of anything, it was dark grey and stood out from all the other clouds, i have no idea what it was a strange single cloud, a weather ballon, a spaceship? it was shaped almost like cloud city on star wars...Would love to hear someone else witnessed it or if anyone can identify this unusual object never seen anything like this
content.summary: Multiple witnesses observed looking at in the sky i first noticed girl with binoculars then i snapped photos

content.detailedDescription: I saw this bright light in the sky at 530.It was 10 mins ruffly and the pass it off as hum weird then again that night at 1030it came back so i grab my camora . and took pictures ofthis bight red ball with my small digital camorai was shocked to see it  come back at night .That was the last time i saw it  i took 8 pictures they all are different,then it vanished.Please look at these pictures andlet me know what the hell is it .
content.summary: Big orange ball

content.detailedDescription:
1 walking dogs near netley creek manitoba, canada

2 the object was directly in the direction of my travel.  it was bright and steady, like the lights you see on the tops of towers.  however, there are no towers in that direction.

3  i had no clue what it was.  i grew up as an air force brat, and know thats not the pattern to lights on a plane...A single steady large red light...

4  the motions have given me food for thought.  they could not have been an aircraft or helicopter...Too silent, too maneuverable.  when it stopped to the west of me, i wanted to scream for others to look.  by then i was thinking it could have been a drone.  they are certainly a maturing technology.  what made me realize it was not a drone is the way it accelerated and climbed away.  that sudden change was devastatingly fast.  by the way...Prevailing winds that day were from the north-west.

object was moving against the wind.

5  awe.  amusement.  told my wife.

6  the object rapidly ascended, exceeding available eyesight to track it.
content.summary: A distinct bright red orb moved steadily in a straight northward path.  it slowed to a near stop when to the west.  it then continued northward, but sped disarmingly quickly, seeming to both climb and recede from view.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my terrace looking ne and saw a few planes then i saw red light gliding south then hover for about 10 seconds, then a plane was approaching from the north and the red light object started to quickly rise and glide south behind the building in front of me, the second and third videos were of the object as it appread south of the building. this happened about an hour ago. i'm attaching the three video i took with my i phone. i am leaving town torrow for a week and won't be back until the 20th. p.S. because it desended between buildings. i am thinking it could be a drone, but the distance it covered rules that out.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: From van courtland park 250th st. to about 207th st. red and white  object gliding, hovering then shooting off hover and gliding and deesending

content.detailedDescription:
Boyfriend and i were driving on highway heading out of ottawa toward the west and we both saw, clearly, a dark orange--toward red--glowing light, presumably an object of some kind, emitting a strange, blurry-edged light. my boyfriend saw it first and said, "what is that?!?"  we both craned our eyes and looked at it carefully as we drove past it in the sky. 

its edges looked blurry and indistinct, but the object was clearly visible. it was hovering in the sky, as if it was a street light in the fog, but there was no fog. and it was not a streetlight.

it was shaped like a large take-out coffee mug, so not a cone or cylinder, but somewhat in between. as we were on the highway, we had to keep driving. 

we both felt surprisingly nonplussed, as though that was a perfectly normal thing to see.  it seemed close, but it was hard to tell. from where we could see it, it seemed like it was not very high up, but was not very large. 

the strangest thing about it, to me, was the blurry edges. it was nothing like what i have ever seen before.
content.summary: Blurry orange-red glowing hovering light viewed while driving on highway

content.detailedDescription: I live out in the country and was over at a friends house for a bit that night , it was getting close to 8 pm and was time for me to go home , so my friend said he would walk with me half way ,it was very nice out that night and was clear out in the sky , we were walking along the road and it was just starting to get darker outside , we got to a little opening in the road and trees i had my back turned at first and my friend was looking up in the sky , i was talking to him and he wasn't paying attention to what i was saying he was just looking up , he said to me "hey man look at those stars don't they seem way closer than the others , i turned around and looked up at the three bright lights in the sky they had to of been only like 175-200 feet in the air , they were solid white lights that where glowing ,they only stayed in one spot for about 3 seconds than the bottom right light shot backwards and flew off into the sky , you could actually see it getting further and further away but at a really fast speed , the other 2 stars lined up with one another and started to move slowly together to the left , it was also crazy to see that where the 3 stars where sitting directly behind them was the 3 stars or orion's belt , almost like they where trying to hide infront of them so that maybe we wouldn't notice them , the 2 stars that started to move to the left started to get blocked off by the trees so my friend and me started to run up the road abit , the front light shot starlight up into the sky and disappeared the back star than started to fly up at a 45 degree angle and just kept going until we couldn't see it anymore . while this was happening my friend and me both felt that they where watching us , we where frozen in shock at first we both had tears pouring from our eyes but couldn't blink or look away when we ran up the road when they started to move it was like i didn't even know i was running i wasent even looking where i was running something just pulled us to run after it after they started to move away . me and him talked to each other about what we saw and agreed we seen the same thing and that it wasn't planes or anything like that , we both rushed back to my house and told my parents and my sister and her boyfriend , they all laughed at us and said it couldn't of happend , we have told other people and only some believe our story , since that day me and that same friend have seen unexplained things in the sky 2 more time together , and i've also seen something once with my girlfriend and once by myself all in the same general area . and always feel like i'm going to see something again .
content.summary: They hid infront of orion's belt and mimicked the stars. till we saw them.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother, roommate and myself were out on the back porch of our house this morning at 3am. we wanted to attempt a ce-5 session. after about an hour of meditation together we weren't sure if any ufo's would appear. feeling greatly refreshed from the hours session we were gazing upon the stars, looking towards the n-ne-e sky and talked about our meditation experience.

i had noticed the moon was rising from the ne-e region of the sky. looking to that direction i seen a cluster of stars above the move, very faintly and had a feeling it was the pleiades constellation. i pulled out my phone and went to google sky and pointed my phone into the eastern sky and seen a star named "alcyone" which apparently is one of the main stars in the pleiadian constellation i later found out. 

feeling really excited about what i was looking at i went over to my brother and roommate and pointed out the cluster. i then went back to my seat i was previously sitting in for meditation and looking to the eastern sky i witnessed a bright white orb of light through our neighbor's tree and immediately i knew it was a ufo as i have seen countless others in the past few years now but this was a first time for my brother and roommate. i ran over to my brother and roommate and pointed out while shouting "look! there's one right there!" and they both were amazed to see what they were looking at. 

we silently watched this orb of white light flowing across the sky which had most likely come from the south and was moving n-ne from our perspective. we noticed a slight wobble in it's path of flight but it had a perfect flow as they usually do and also it turned from white to a golden yellow/orange color but disappeared behind our neighbor's roof.

we plan to make another ce-5 attempt tonight.
content.summary: White ufo flying with consistent speed/flow, glowing white brightly then to dull white then to orange/yellow.

content.detailedDescription:
I was living in an apartment on the ground floor. i awoke suddenly at approximately 3:00am (i checked my phone) on april 21st, 2014. from my bedroom window i could see that my motion sensor light had gone off.

all of a sudden a blue orb, the size of a large beach ball, appeared in my room (maybe about 10ft away from me). i became paralyzed...Unable to move or speak. there was a loud high pitch ringing in my ears. it was unbearable. 

after about 10 seconds the sound stopped, i was able to move and the object disappeared, but somehow the time had jumped from 3am (approx) - 5am (approx).

i felt confused. not scared. like somehow what happened was necessary
content.summary: Bright blue orb appeared in my bedroom

content.detailedDescription:
I had ridden my bicycle along the alameda creek trail to the foot of the sf bay. i was lying down on a bench resting and staring up at the clouds at 3:15pm when i suddenly spied a small, round, whitish object moving about 2-3 times the speed of an airliner. it was less than a mile east of my position.

the object was spherical with a dull white color with no lights to be seen. there were clouds overhead (see photo) and i could see that the object was definitely lower than the clouds as i could clearly see it as it passed under them. if i had not seen the object as i was staring up then i probably would have never seen it. since there were no lights and it was a dull white i really had to try hard to follow it's flight pattern in the bright mid day sun. i considered taking out my phone for a picture but realized it was too high for a good photo and if i looked down at my phone, i would probably not be able to follow the object.

the object was flying in a straight line from south to north less than a mile east of my position. (see photo) i lost sight of it maybe 10 miles north over hayward or san leandro. it moved about 2-3 times faster than an incoming airliner but it appeared a lot smaller. i would say that from my vantage point, the object was about 1/5 the size of an average jetliner.

it had a roundish shape, no lights, no sounds, i watched it for maybe a minute as it flew in a straight south-north line and disappeared out of my site. i noted the time was 3:15pm. a few weeks earlier i spotted a similar looking object, on a similar course at a similar speed at 9:15pm. it stayed at a steady altitude and a straight line, was lower than the cloud cover and was flying right over the busy sf bay airport traffic on it's way up the eastern shore of the sf bay.
content.summary: Saw whitish object moving quickly from south to north along east sf bay shoreline.

content.detailedDescription: I jude traverse and 2 of my coworkers got off work at 4:00 pm on may the 8 2013,we got in the truck to drive from albian sands to town and we noticed 2 grey objects up in the sky aprox 200 000 feet the reason i say this is because this was a blue sky no clouds in the middle of the day there was a jumbo jet that was flying across the sky and the jets usually fly around 35000 feet i had this plane to compare it too . there was a puff of black smoke from the small square grey object and it drove into the much larger grey object then the smoke continued and the object drove south above the plane that was heading south as we'll we watched it for 20 minutes until it went over the horizon . have the jet to compare the size was really cool it was about 10 times higher than the jet and at that distance it made the jumbo jet look like a play toy we were really amazed with it .
content.summary: Me and my 2 co workers observed a small grey craft get absorbed in to a large grey square craft and flew across the sky at an elevation that was 10 times higher than the plane that was flying across the sky it was a jet the ufo made it look like a toy

content.detailedDescription:
I drive a wine-tour van and was parked at 45 north vineyard, awaiting a tour group. seated in the shade, i was observing a small flock of birds hovering in search of food in the vineyard. noticed a brown object among the birds that was circular and totally still. it struck me, so i stood up and that's when i felt a strange feeling that the object "noticed" me. just as i began to realize i was seeing something unusual, the object quickly zig-zagged and then headed due west at a high rate of speed (into the wind) and behind the building. 

i thought, "wow, i just saw a ufo and it's just like everybody else says - it hovered, moved quickly and without a sound, and then disappeared."
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Watching birds hover looking for food. noticed brown object hovering very still, moved directly west, zigged, then zagged, moved quickly west out of view.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were sitting on the front patio at approximately 9:45 in the evening on july 12. it had been dark for only a short time. as my son was speaking to me he noticed a large ball of light in the eastern sky a short distance above the tree line. i immediately turned around just in time to see a basketball shaped light reduce to what appeared to be a standard commercial aircraft. then within a second or two the whole thing disappeared. we immediately commented to each other, "what was that?". then the whole sky lit up like a firework flash or heat lightning. then nothing. never heard a sound just a visual sighting. filing this report just in case anyone else veiwed something similar.
content.summary: Witnessed a ball of light that appeared as a huge oversized star that dimmed into what seemed like a plane then suddenly disappeared. about five seconds later the whole sky quickly lit up like a flash. then nothing.

content.detailedDescription: Just looked on google earth around dawson forrest and saw it in sky
content.summary: Found on google earth street view

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my bed looking out at the sky and valley seen from our home on a hill when i was 11 years old. my bedroom window over looked thousands of trees that surrounded our home that was located in a country neighborhood. i did this almost every evening before bed. my eyes were up at the stars then i caught a site out of the corner of my eye. when i saw this the giant ship hovering silently which seemed just a few feet away from our house i froze unable to take my eye's away. it was not a smooth surface or anything like the silver pictures most see on tv or in tabloids. it was of a copper/brown tone with things poking upward from the top and round and somewhat flat. i could not see the bottom as it was hovering just a few feet over the tree's that i looked down onto from our hill. it was like we were starring at each other face to face. it began flashing lights in a calming and beautiful pattern. i did not hear a single thing with my ears, but in my mind i heard a tone with the lights. a song. and not sure if this was a smart or stupid thing i did next, but out of reflex i wanted my brothers and parents to see this amazing thing. i turned my head and screamed, "mom, a spaceship!!!" i turned back to look at it again, this time it was drifting away (still close to tree tops). i heard the stomping feet of my excited little brother racing to see and turned saying, "hurry!". when i turned back it flew extremely fast at an up and over angle in the southwest direction then disappeared right as my family all came rushing in at once. everyone was excited, but sadly no one else saw this event. they all groaned and turned out mumbling things. i still remember the details, however, after about 10 years the song faded from memory. there was a repeated pattern of lights with a hum of calming tones that i wish i could still remember. spiritually, i am touched because that was my time of night where i prayed to be free from that small town, to travel, to explore. what better visit then from another planet.
content.summary: Hovered over the valley for a few minutes moved away then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was taking a night walk with my husband in monsanto village, in portugal.

2. the village is located in an elevation and from there we have panoramic view for all the surrounding places, and i was facing east from a descending street in the same direction.

3. 'there goes an ufo'.

4. it was around 22.40pm. the sky was full of stars because there are few city and village lights interfering with the sky viewing, no clouds that night, summer breeze and 24c/75f of temperature. it was green light, round shaped, it looked like a green traffic light because of it's color and brightness. it was going in a fast speed from west to east, spain direction. the object only took 2 seconds covering a distance that a plane covers in about 20 seconds. it was probably more than 1 mile high, and at least 2 miles away from the place i was.

5. since it wasn't the first time i saw an ufo, i knew what i was seeing in that very same moment. i sometimes 'know' that something is going to happen a few minutes or hours before it happens, and sometimes 'something' makes me look up, like someone is tapping me in the shoulder and saying to me: 'look up, now'.
after the sighting i went to a terrace in the place i was staying, that has a panoramic view from the village surroundings and an incredidle sky visibility, stayed there for 40mn searching the sky but had no luck. the night after i spent 3h looking the sky between 9pm and 0am, but had no luck in a new sighting.

6. i was gone in a blink, like it was vanished in the air.
content.summary: Green light ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my room at approximately 10:48 pm.,when i heard my dad screaming for me to come outside. i ran out to our backyard , and to my amazement when i look up at the sky there were up to 15 balls of light of various sizes and colors blue,green,and white balls of light, seemed to be at various altitudes.Across the sky which seemed to spread out for unknown amount of miles.Upon first seeing these lights i was in complete shock.There were no stars out to be seen just these objects.Honestly at first i got nervous ,due to the amount of lights in the sky.As i stated they were all balls of light it seemed to me like the blue and green lights were gathering up all the white lights ,almost like a herd.During that time witnessed other blue and white lights ,coming from numerous directions in which i can only describe as lagging behind the other lights .But they were making up their distances ,by reaching incredible speed. i noticed only 2 balls of light .One was blue the other white make 90 degree direction changes.They were all heading nw, towards the sea.As i stated before when first witnessed , i was in shock .But it almost looked something from the movie close encounters ,because of the amount of lights in the sky and the different directions they were coming from.Once we lost sight of the lights heading nw .I stood outside looking up at the sky to 1am, and i did not notice one light or star in the night sky.I was so caught up in the moment that i didn't get my phone to record the event ,which i am seriously regretting now.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Numerous lights up to 15.At various altitudes,from multiple directions.As if gathering a herd.

content.detailedDescription:
Me & my 2 children plus the campers beside us...All camping at dar state park by the campfire

around 10pm my daughter noticed a white round object going overhead at star level, it was a very clear night, & these were higher than the jet that passed by 15 minutes before

 it came from the south & was going north, if a star looks like a speck of dust this was pill size on the first pass,i thought maybe it was the space station. on its second pass maybe 15 minutes later it was considerably smaller but close to the same path about 20 minutes prior, odd i had a feeling we were going to see one prior to this

then we spotted together another one some time after that moved near a star, it stopped, went some more from the south to the north & then shot off to the ne very fast like

i know of nothing that can stop its flight

all was quiet until 11:45 pm when she spotted 2 separated by a couple of stars distance between them both going north, they went about half way across the horizon when all of a sudden they disappeared, the 3 of us all seen this

the campers beside us i think saw them too, but was hesitant to acknowledge though they too were looking into the sky with us

at this point my children & i became , nervous, scared & retreated to bed, its odd that several of us all seen the same objects

they were all round white luminescence, its no plane or jet that i have ever seen
content.summary: 2 following each other separated by a few stars distance between them

content.detailedDescription:
Came outside for smoke in late evening - i saw something illuminated move above my garden shed roof and stop - i looked at it and decided to take a picture - only had my iphone - i couldn't see much detail on the picture so went back into house to get camera - when returned it was gone. 
object was seen in direction of london city airport - from the time i first noticed it to my seeing that it was gone is close to 3 minutes maximum.
content.summary: Seen from garden

content.detailedDescription:
My mother decided to attempt a "short cut" between the small town of siletz, or. and corvallis, or.  we were driving to portland to catch a plane to n.Y.

this lead us onto a logging road, where we got lost. 

here's the very strange thing:  we were talking about paranormal phenomenon, when we saw the ufo.  ever since i was a child, i was curious about it.  i was just asking my mother to purchase for me, for christmas, the "time life" series of books about paranormal phenomenon, when we looked up, and saw a large (soundless) shimmering disc in the sky. my mother estimates it was a little over a football field away from the car.  we were scared at first, then curious.  it was huge.  it was a silver/iridescent/shimmering color.  rainbow/iridescent lights were all around it's bottom round edge.  my mother pulled the car off to the side of the road. she asked me to reach into the back seat of the car,  and get my camera out of my luggage to take a photo of it.

it was like they heard her ask me this.  the minute i began the motion of turning around, the silver disc went from hovering, above the road to, in the blink of an eye, behind the patch of trees, just off to the left side of the road. my impression was they didn't want me to take a photo.  it then, soundlessly, ascended and disappeared into the sky.

i'm 39 yrs. old now.  it was the summer after 8th grade, going into 9th grade.  i remember it as clear as day.  so does my mother, who is also available for questioning.

we called the local police, and they said that several people had called in and reported it.
content.summary: A large disc (soundless), hovering above the road.  we pulled off to the side of the road.  it then (in the blink of an eye) moved behind trees, then ascended into the sky & vanished

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way back home from hockey practice with my team mate and his father. his father was driving the car and pointed out to us that there was one large triangluar shaped object which was hovering above the elementary school. he pulled the car over and we got out of the car to watch it more. the object could have been 300-400 feet in the air, mad a low near-inaudible hum, rotated very slowly, but didn't leave the mark where it was hovering for a few minutes. we all thought for sure that it was from the military base which is also a part of dane county airport. 

the object began to move very slowly s/sw over mud lake towards lake kegonsa. we followed the object down johnson st and stopped at the corner of johnson st and marsh woods dr, where we observed two more objects which were a few hundred feet to the west. the additional objects seemed to be doing the same thing as the first object; none of them seemed to be doing much except hovering. 

one by one, the objects increased in speed and moved in a southwesterly direction. the speed was not anything crazy, certainly no faster than a jet. did not make any additional noise as it sped up. after that, we went home and never saw it again. 

i will fully admit that these may have been military aircraft. i have never seen military aircraft like that but that doesn't mean that they don't exist.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed three triangular shaped objects. one hovered and then moved, the other two floated without stopping.
